markdownRemark.html: Costa Water Parks is a local company which has inflatable and floating water parks at different locations along the coast. Also located in Sotogrande, Mijas Costa, Fuengirola and Benalmádena (in front of Bil-Bil Castle)

frontmatter.title: Waterparks in the Sea (Puerto Banus)

tags: Top things to do with kids in Costa del Sol
